name: Curse of Enchantia
description:
The magical world of Enchantia is under the curse of a powerful and malevolent witch. To satisfy her desire for eternal youth she requires a young boy as a final ingredient for a rejuvenating potion.
Sucked into the cursed land of Enchantia, Brad must battle through this mysterious and perilous land in order to free himself of this evil curse and return home safely.

    Curse of Enchantia is a visual spectacular featuring over 150 locations.
    Completley icon driven for ease of use
    Atmospheric music and sound effects
    32 colours (Amiga)
    256 colours (IBM PC and compatibles)
    Packed with humorous animated sequences and bizarre characters



"All in all Curse of Enchantia comes across as flawless. I can safely say this is the best adventure game on the Amiga to date." Amiga Action 94% "Action Accolade"
